CORE.name: CORE
CORE.description: The main module for the app.

APP.GUI.name: APP.GUI
APP.GUI.description: A sub module of APP that deals with the GUI.

APP.name: APP
APP.description: The main module for the app.

APP.save_and_recall.name: APP.save_and_recall
APP.save_and_recall.description: A sub module of APP that deals with saving and recalling APP and environment states and data.

classitems.description: Displays a busy indicator. (This feature is in pre-alpha state. Do not use it yet.)

params.name: parent
params.description: Parent element

classitems.name: showBusyIndicator

classitems.description: Hides the busy indicator again.  (This feature is in pre-alpha state. Do not use it yet.)
classitems.name: showBusyIndicator

classitems.description: Displays a busy indicator. (This feature is in pre-alpha state. Do not use it yet.)
classitems.name: setIcon

params.name: element
params.description: DOM element of the icon (has to be be img)

params.name: icon_id
params.description: Name of the icon.

classitems.description: Sets a value to a form element
classitems.name: setFormValue

params.name: element_id
params.description: ID of DOM element

params.name: value
params.description: Value

params.name: open_vocabulary
params.description: If element is an open vocabulary, it should be provided here, too.

classitems.description: Initializes the app. This method is called on "DOMContentLoaded".
classitems.name: init

params.name: no_recall
params.description: If true, the app will not attempt to recall saved data from the application cache.

classitems.description: Tries to retrieve the APP language by looking at what language the browser is set (navigator.language).
classitems.name: getActiveLanguageByNavigatorLanguageOrTakeDefault

return.description: LanguagePack Returns an APP LanguagePack, that matches the browser language or returns the default LanguagePack of the APP.

classitems.description: Tries to get a term in a specific language. This method is called by environments each time a language dependent term is displayed by an environment.
classitems.name: getTermInActiveLanguage

params.name: LanguagePacksArray
params.description: An array with all the available LanguagePacks of the environment.

params.name: arg1
params.description: First key in LanguagePack to look at.

params.name: arg2
params.description: Second key in LanguagePack to look at.

params.name: arg3
params.description: Third key in LanguagePack to look at.

params.name: arg4
params.description: Fourth key in LanguagePack to look at.

return.description: term Returns the term in the specific language. If there is no term in that language, the term in the default language is returned. If there is no term in the default language, APP.CONF.language_error_placeholder is returned.

classitems.description: Checks if the app is started for the first time or not and fires a fitting welcome note. (TO DO: The check in this method should be replaced by a check, if a data object can be retrieved or not.
classitems.name: checkIfFirstStart

classitems.description: Shows a log message to the user
classitems.name: log

params.name: message
params.description: The message to display.

params.name: type
params.description: Type of the log message resulting in different colors ("error" => red flag, "success" => green flag, else: black flag).

classitems.description: Shows a confirm dialog to the user
classitems.name: confirm

params.name: message
params.description: The message to display.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be called when the user makes a decision. An bool value is passed to this function: true when user pressed ok, false when user pressed cancel.

params.name: ok_label
params.description: The text of the OK button.

params.name: cancel_label
params.description: The text of the cancel button.

classitems.description: Shows an alert message to the user.
classitems.name: alert

params.name: message
params.description: The message to display.

classitems.description: This method deletes all saved data and reloads the app. It is quite DANGEROUS!
classitems.name: hard_reset

classitems.description:
This method changes the view of the app. A view can be a view of the app, 
or of a module of an environment.
classitems.name: view

params.name: module_or_id
params.description: It can be a module or an id of a view element.

classitems.description: Saves the current state of the APP and the active environment.
classitems.name: save

classitems.description: Saves a file with text content. For the user, it looks like a download.
classitems.name: saveTextfile

params.name: text
params.description: Content of file as string

params.name: filename
params.description: Filename

params.name: mime_type
params.description: Mime type for download

classitems.description: Gets all XML strings from output textareas, makes files and zips these files into one. For the user, it looks like a download of a ZIP file.
classitems.name: zipAllOutputFiles

classitems.description: Gets all XML strings from output textareas, makes files and saves them. For the user, it looks like several downloads.
classitems.name: saveAllOutputFiles

classitems.description:
Recalls and sets the app state. If recall_object.active_environment_id is given, it tries to load that environment and recalls the environment state too.
If environment_data is undefined, it tries to get the recall data for that environment by checking the browser database.
classitems.name: recall

params.name: recall_object
params.description: Object with the state of the app.

params.name: environment_data
params.description: Object with the state of an environment to be loaded.

classitems.description: Changes the language of the app. Reloads the app, so that changes are effective immediately.
classitems.name: changeLanguage

params.name: index
params.description: Index of the language in the array my.languages

classitems.description: Searches for a language entry in LanguageIndex.js. Displays a screen where the user can select a language from the results. Selection will be passed as parameter to on_select
classitems.name: doStandardLanguageSearch

params.name: input
params.description: Input string

params.name: on_select
params.description: Method to be called when the user selects a language. Selection will be passed as parameter.

classitems.description: Tries to get environment data from browser database.
classitems.name: getRecallDataForEnvironment

params.name: environment
params.description: An environment object.

classitems.description: Sets the autosave interval of the app.
classitems.name: setAutosaveInterval

params.name: time
params.description: Time in seconds

classitems.description: Sets the state of the active environment.
classitems.name: recallEnvironmentData

params.name: recall_object
params.description: Environment state object

classitems.description: Deletes all data in the browser database.
classitems.name: deleteAllData

classitems.description: Deletes the saved data of the active environment from the browser database.
classitems.name: deleteEnvironmentData

classitems.description: Saves current app and environment states in the browser database and notifies the user about that..
classitems.name: userSave

classitems.description: Saves current app and environment states in the browser database.
classitems.name: save

classitems.description: Saves current app and environment states to a file. For the user, this looks like a download.
classitems.name: saveAllToFile

classitems.description: Saves the active environment state to a file. For the user, this looks like a download.
classitems.name: saveActiveEnvironmentStateToFile
